definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: collection, collected mass (P);—cstr. [[מִקְוֵךְ]] Ge 1:10 ([[מִקְוֶה]] also v:Ge 1:9, for [[מָקוֹם]] acc. to LXX Ball), Ex 7:19, Le 11:36, all of water. —´[[מ]]: 1Ki 10:28, 1Ki 10:28 = [[מִקְוֵא]] 2Ch 1:16 (company of merchants; drove of houses), v. [[קׂוֶה]] p. 875
